name: Icy Boi
description:
This is my first game! It's a platformer that emphasizes movement such as wall climbing, double jumping, and ceiling dashing. 

Sorry about youtube video's garbage quality currently away from home working on my laptop but wanted to get this out there anyways.

I have stopped working on Icy Boi for now and switched to Unreal to try to make an FPS but if people like it I have ideas for more worlds!
